Detailed Description

A text editor document may contain text of a variable length. A maximum length and a font can be specified too.

BOOLEAN TextEditorDocument::IsCrSupported (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns TRUE if the carriage return support corresponding to the standard GSM 03.38 is supported.

Implements EditorDocument.

void TextEditorDocument::SetCrSupported (  BOOLEAN  flag  )  [inline]
 

To fulfill the standard GSM 03.38 this method must get invoked with the parameter TRUE. In this case a carriage return is supported.

void TextEditorDocument::SetFont (  const Font &  font  ) 
 

Sets the font which should be used for the text rendering. Per default the font defined in the APOXI theme for Font::Editor is used.

void TextEditorDocument::SetLineHeight (  XYDIM  line_height  )  [inline]
 

Sets the height of the line in pixels. If a value <= 0 is used, the line-height of the text-compound-item is used, which is set to the height of the font Font::Editor.

void TextEditorDocument::SetMaxItemCount (  INT  max_item_count  ) 
 

Sets the maximum number of allowed characters.

Sets the content of the document.
